metadata.title: CVE-2023-45871 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/net/ethernet/intel/igb/igb_main.c in theIGB driver in the Linux kernel before 6.5.3. A buffer size may not beadequate for frames larger than the MTU.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45871` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-azure - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-lowlatency - 6.8.0-31.31.1

No subscription required
